title: thespacemall
author: thespacemall
content: THE SPACE MALL (TSM) - AN INNOVATIVE 3D SHOPPING CENTER  SUPPORTED IN BLOCKCHAIN  What is it The Space Mall ?The Space Mall was born from the idea of ​​bringing together two worlds that have not yet been found on a single platform: the "relatively" new world of cryptocurrency investments and the world of traditional commercial companies, where users will have the possibility of acquiring goods and services. exchanging cryptocurrencies and in turn the companies will make their products available by accepting the authorized cryptocurrencies.What is it TSM ?TSM is the official cryptocurrency will be use in the future 3d The Space Mall virtual center as a payment method, is based on BEP-20.Here more details about : Total Max Supply : 500,000,000 TSM Algorithm : BEP-20 mineable : nolink to https://bscscan.com/ https://bscscan.com/token/0x04a8932061f609688f90A990d3326e7E11ee097E  MissionCreate an ecosystem where traditional businesses can make their products known throughout the world through our platform, putting them in the ideal conditions to make them visible to innovative markets such as cryptocurrencies, thus acquiring new customers and overcoming the greatest crisis economy of all time.Offer a social network different from those that already exist and give a different meaning to the way of making acquisitions in the great world of the Internet.VisionCreate a community where the meeting point will be an innovative 3D Blockchain shopping mall.Where for the first time the people who arecurrently cryptocurrency holders will be able to make real purchases and who has notcryptocurrencies will find the means to buy them;where companies will find a secure means of selling their products, accepting only cryptocurrencies. Finally we will create onevirtual society where you will be able to make new friends and interact with people you knowthey will find in their network of friends.More about The Space Mall project Web site : https://www.thespacemall.com/Ticker : TSMSocial : FACEBOOKhttps://www.facebook.com/shoppingcenter3D/?modal=admin_todo_tourINSTAGRAMhttps://instagram.com/thespacemallcoin?igshid=1qu8pupsbye3TELEGRAMhttps://t.me/+d8c9hUULA6NhN2JkTWITTERhttps://twitter.com/thespacemall
